title: Scandal Sheet (restored, with intro and outro) (1952, film noir, imdb score: 7.4)

sources.title: Scandal Sheet (restored, with intro and outro) (1952, film noir, imdb score: 7.4)
sources.description: Scandal Sheet is a 1952 American film noir directed by Phil Karlson . The film is based on the 1944 novel The Dark Page by Samuel Fuller , who himself was a newspaper reporter before his career in film. The drama features Broderick Crawford , Donna Reed and John Derek .
